treatment-md.title: Acanthobothrium westi Vardo-Zalik & Campbell, 2011, sp. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: Five new species of Acanthobothrium van Beneden, 1849 (Cestoda: Tetraphyllidea) in elasmobranchs from the northwest Atlantic and Gulf of Mexico with first records from smooth-hound sharks and guitarfish
